description: This file contains environment variables that are used during development and tests.

development.SYNAPSE_USERNAME: ...set to a Synapse username that is suitable for testing...
development.SYNAPSE_ENCRYPTED_STORAGE_LOCATION_ID: ...set to a storage location id that is suitable for testing...
development.LOGIN_WHITELIST: ...set to comma separated list of emails that can access the app...
development.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_TEAM_MANAGER_USER_I: ...set to comma separated list of user IDs to add to the project team as managers...
development.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_GRANT_PROJECT_ACCES: ...set to comma separated list of principal IDs and permission code (123:ADMIN,124:CAN_EDIT)...
development.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_GRANT_TEAM_ACCESS: ...set to comma separated list of synapse IDs and permission code (syn123:ADMIN,syn124:CAN_EDIT)...
development.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_FOLDER_NAMES: ...set to comma separated list of folder names...
development.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_WIKI_PROJECT_ID: ...set to the Synapse project ID to copy the wiki from...
development.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_CONTRIBUTION_AGREEM: ...set to the Synapse table ID to update contribution agreement data...
development.CREATE_SYNAPSE_SPACE_LOG_FOLDER_ID: ...set to the Synapse folder ID where logs will be stored...

test.SYNAPSE_USERNAME: ...set to a Synapse username that is suitable for testing...
test.SYNAPSE_ENCRYPTED_STORAGE_LOCATION_ID: ...set to a storage location id that is suitable for testing...
test.TEST_OTHER_SYNAPSE_USER_ID: ...set to a Synapse user ID that is not the same as SYNAPSE_USERNAME...
test.TEST_EMAIL: ...set to a real email address that supports + syntax (john+test@something.com)...
